name: Little Shrimp：Legend Reborn
description:
This is a high-freedom role-playing game set in the martial world theme, and you have the power to change this world. You can experience classic storylines from famous martial arts novels, enjoy the stories, and make choices at crucial moments. Justice isn't the only path; your destiny is in your hands.
From a humble commoner to a renowned hero in the martial world, all for the sake of belonging to that world, this is the story of Little Shrimp：Legend Reborn

[Game Features]

The game features a collection of various classic martial arts techniques from famous martial arts novels, covering both External and Inner Energy. The combat system seamlessly integrates the two energies, allowing players the freedom to utilize a variety of martial arts skills in battle. Each martial art is meticulously designed to capture the essence of the original work and is seamlessly integrated into the interactive elements of the game.

[Unique Skills and Quick Progress]

Hey there! You, who are new to the Jianghu world, have unique bones and extraordinary talent for martial arts. With the help of this VIP10 and a wealth of gold and silver treasures, you can directly reach the pinnacle of the Jianghu. Along the way, various martial heroes will come and join you, and together, you will become a hero of the ages!

[Classic Jianghu, Authentic Experience]

Highly faithful to famous martial arts novels, it recreates classic scenes. Did you know that the talking Condor was so talkative because of its love for food? Is the man with a built-in sound hi-fi still handsome and suave as ever? Rescue the beautiful women trapped in the Shaolin Temple, and more. Explore the classic scenes to find peerless martial arts secrets, meet knowledgeable innkeepers, and search for retired martial arts masters. It's the true, original Jianghu experience, staying true to the classics!

[A Six-Year Labor for this masterpiece]

Six years in the making, every detail is meticulously crafted, offering a comprehensive and mature gaming system that provides you with an amazing Jianghu experience. With its retro art style, classic storyline, and the nostalgic JAVA-style, this game offers a relaxed and enjoyable gameplay mode and incredibly satisfying gaming rewards. It's definitely worth trying!

[Martial Arts Mastery and Peak Duels]

Experience the pinnacle of martial arts combat, enhanced by formations, treasures, and secret techniques. Enjoy high freedom and strong strategic depth as you spar with other martial heroes in the Jianghu. There's also a cross-server martial arts tournament where you can exchange martial arts skills with disciples from various regions. Sharing gaming insights and strategies among experts creates thrilling duels every time!

[Entertaining Storylines and Free Exploration]

Adventure, encounters, cultivation, and inheritance; the jianghu is full of hidden stories. Faction conflicts, gang invasions, and the pursuit of villains are filled with joy, anger, sorrow, and laughter, driven by interests, power, money, and reputation. In this small Jianghu, all of this awaits your free exploration. On the Jianghu road, you can also meet a group of righteous companions, establish a powerful faction, and make a name for yourself!
